features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Polartec® 200 microfleece provides lightweight warmth that repels moisture for quick-drying performance and versatility(available in 100, 200, and 300 weights)
Attached hood with stretch binding at opening provides adjustable coverage
Elastic binding on the cuffs, hem, and hood
Zippered microfleece hand-warmer pockets and chest pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
